text: Tyasapachi allāhalē ē'uṭā kāga paṭhāyō, jasalē ki māṭō yasakāraṇa khanirahēkō thiyō ki tyasalā'ī dēkhā'ōs ki usalē āphnō bhā'ikō mr̥taka śarīra kasarī lukā'ōs. Usalē bhanna thālyō ki jyādai duḥkhakō kurō cha ki mabāṭa yati pani huna sakēna ki ma yasa kāga jastō āphnō bhā'ikō śava lukā'una sakūm̐ . Ani usalā'ī pachutō bhayō ra ū lajjitaharūmadhyēkō bhayō
